p: For our analysis here we use an infectious period of duration 1 (without loss of generality since there are no units of time imposed) and transmission rate Î² = 0.5. For each combination of parameter values tested, we generated 10 3 networks and ran 10 2 disease outbreaks on each one. The results presented are the means over all 10 5 simulated outbreaks. Simulations were performed using the SIR code from the Epidemics on Networks (EoN) Python library [ 23].
